name: ladder
description: There's a wooden ladder that rises up from a perfectly square hole. It seems to lead downward.

name: ladder
description: There's a wooden ladder with rungs perfectly spaced. The ladder itself is afixed to the wall and seems to lead upwards.

name: boulders
description: A large pile of imposing boulders block the hallway to the south. It's no use trying to move them.

name: ALEVE
description: A small blue pill that might help with back pain

name: Garbage Sword
description: An old sword made out of actual garbage. It might be worse than nothing

name: Leather Cap
description: It's old and worn but it'll keep you safer than nothing.

name: Short Sword
description: A small sword, somewhere between a shank and a dagger.

name: Reinforced Shield
description: A wooden shield, but with some metal reinforcement.

name: Average Sword
description: It's what you think of when you think of a sword. Pretty all right.

name: Rabbit ºs Foot
description: The rabbit's foot is a mark of mastery, and a good luck charm to boot!

name: Holy Hand Grenade
description: An ornate grenade with a cross on it. Possibly holy.

name: pile of rubble
description: There is small pile of rubble. Perhaps a grave marker?

name: guilt
description: You feel the burden of having taken an innocent life

name: encampment
description: Sticks and tarp make up a few tents surrounding a crackling fire. A goblin chef(?) tends to the spit over the flame, while others go about their camp duties

name: atrium
description: The large, vaulted ceiling of the atrium displays the chaotic shadows from the camp's fire. This building must have once been great, but is now riddled with cracks and holes of varying sizes.

name: sky
description: There's a wooden ladder that rises up from a perfectly square hole. It seems to lead downward.
